1031101.name: Virescent Pyrojade
1031101.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 5 [Breath] Potency on self (max 2)

1031111.name: Virescent Pyrojade
1031111.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 3 [Breath] Potency on self (max 2)

Against the target(or the Part) a Base Attack Skill hit last, inflict [DianxueDonQuixote] next turn (once per turn)

Deal +([Combustion] Potency on the target)% damage on Critical Hit (max 15%)
- Increase max cap by 5% for every 1 [DianxueDonQuixote] on the target

notes.short: When her passive is active, inflicts {status:DianxueDonQuixote} on the last enemy hit per turn. Stacks when repeatedly inflicting on the same target, but expires when applied to a new target. Skills gain buffs and additional effects when hitting enemies with {status:DianxueDonQuixote}
notes.full:
Activate her passive as soon as possible. When it's active, she inflicts {status:DianxueDonQuixote} on the last enemy she hits every turn. This stacks up to 3 times if you keep applying it on the same enemy. If you apply it to another enemy, the stack on the previous enemy expires, and it restarts at 1 stack on the new one. Her skills gain bonus Clash and/or Base Power against the enemy with the debuff depending on how many stacks it has. She also generates additional {status:Breath} and inflicts additional {status:DefenseDown} on her S2 and S3 when hitting targets with it.

Her conditionals are based on her speed over her target's. Her passive provides {status:Agility} to help with that as long as you keep her {status:Breath} up. All her conditionals max out at 4 speed higher than her target's.
